source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a dramatic time-lapse landscape scenery shot, capturing the immense power of nature. A colossal supercell storm cloud, a swirling mass of dark grey, charcoal, and ethereal blue-green hues, dominates the sky as it churns and advances across the frame. Below this turbulent canopy lies a vast, vibrant green field stretching to a distant horizon where sheets of rain are visibly falling. The scene lacks a singular main subject, as the composition emphasizes the overwhelming scale and atmospheric drama of the weather phenomenon itself, dwarfing the few small, silhouetted trees on the right and drawing the viewer's focus to the raw, environmental spectacle.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback:
1.The clouds are an interweaving of dark gray, light gray and blue-green hues, with no charcoal present.
2.The silhouetted trees are located in the lower part slightly to the right of the center of the frame, instead of on the right.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback:
1. The clouds in the video are a blend of dark gray, light gray, and blue-green hues, without any charcoal tones.
2. The silhouetted trees are positioned in the lower part of the frame, slightly to the right of the center, rather than on the far right.
source_caption_data.final_feedback:

2. The silhouetted trees are positioned in the lower part of the frame, slightly to the right of the center, rather than on the far right.

Below this turbulent canopy lies a vast, vibrant green field stretching to a distant horizon where sheets of rain are visibly falling. The scene lacks a singular main subject, as the composition emphasizes the overwhelming scale and atmospheric drama of the weather phenomenon itself, dwarfing the few small, silhouetted trees positioned in the lower part of the frame, slightly to the right of the center, and drawing the viewer's focus to the raw, environmental spectacle.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly describes the storm cloud as having charcoal hues. The position of the silhouetted trees is misstated as being on the right.
